resources.string: Click This Button To Go To Google Maps
After Selecting The Map Click This Button To Get Directions From Your Current Location

Down To Code is a group of three that is made up of high schoolers. We all come from different backgrounds as well as different lifestyles having been brought together by Girls Who Code, a summer immersion program.Down To Code built this app to solve the problem of looking like an outsider, an outcast, and worst of all looking like a tourist. We want people to take advantage of our app to get out of there comfort zone and go out and explore new places. So with Lowkey LA you will be able to fit in, know all the hidden treasure spots of Los Angeles and leave your comfort zone.

Down To Code is a group of three that is made up of high schoolers. We all come from different backgrounds as well as different lifestyles having been brought together by Girls Who Code, a summer immersion program.
Charlene is 17 years old and currently attending I-Poly High School. She is currently a senior and enjoys working with her group as well as exploring and trying new places in Los Angeles.

Emily is 16 years old and is a senior at Culver City High School. She plans to major in computer science and has a goal to pursue a career in cybersecurity. She enjoys to meet new people and explore different places.
Mariana is a 17 year old. This summer program has made it her best summer yet. She is currently a senior at IPoly High School. She enjoys to watch Netflix. and trying out different things.
